mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARD_SEQ.currval FROM DUAL
insert into BI_BOARD (BOARD_NO,CATE_NO,EMP_ID,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CREATE_DATE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_COUNT,BOARD_FLAG,BOARD_UPDATER,BOARD_UPDATE_DATE) values (BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{CATE}, #{ID}, #{TITLE}, sysdate, #{CONTENT},0,'Y',NULL,NULL)
mapper.select:
select count(*) from BI_BOARD A, BI_CATEGORY B where A.CATE_NO = B.CATE_NAME
and A.BOARD_TITLE like '%' || #{TITLE} || '%'
and A.EMP_ID like '%' || #{ID} || '%'
and B.CATE_NAME = '문서'
and B.CATE_NAME = '교육'
and B.CATE_NAME = '영어'
order by BOARD_NO desc

select BOARD_NO as NO, CATE_NO as CATE, CATE_NAME, EMP_ID as ID, BOARD_TITLE as TITLE, BOARD_CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT as CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT as COUNT, BOARD_FLAG as FLAG, BOARD_UPDATER as UPDATER, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE as UPDATE_DATE from ( select A.BOARD_NO, B.CATE_NO, B.CATE_NAME, A.EMP_ID, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.BOARD_CREATE_DATE, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.BOARD_COUNT, A.BOARD_FLAG, A.BOARD_UPDATER, A.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, row_number() over (order by BOARD_NO desc) rn from BI_BOARD A, BI_CATEGORY B where A.CATE_NO = B.CATE_NAME
and A.BOARD_TITLE like '%' || #{TITLE} || '%'
and A.EMP_ID like '%' || #{ID} || '%'
and CATE_NAME = '문서'
and CATE_NAME = '교육'
and CATE_NAME = '영어'
) where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn <= #{endIndex} and BOARD_FLAG = 'Y' order by BOARD_NO desc

select BOARD_NO, CATE_NO, EMP_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_FLAG, BOARD_UPDATER, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE from BI_BOARD
where BOARD_NO = #{value}
mapper.update: update BI_BOARD set CATE_NO = #{CATE}, EMP_ID = #{ID}, BOARD_TITLE = #{TITLE}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{CONTENT}, BOARD_UPDATER = #{UPDATER}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE where BOARD_NO = #{NO}
mapper.delete: update BI_BOARD set BOARD_FLAG = 'N' where BOARD_NO = #{value}
mapper.update: update BI_BOARD set BOARD_COUNT = NVL(BOARD_COUNT, 0) + 1 where BOARD_NO = #{value}
mapper.select: select REPLY_NO as NO, BOARD_NO, EMP_ID as ID, REPLY_CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, REPLY_CONTENT as CONTENT from BI_BOARD_REPLY where BOARD_NO = #{value}
